note.p: Death: Park Street, Grosvenor Square, London (17 June 1830)
Education: Eton; AB (1764) AM (1767) MB (1770) MD (1774) Christ Church College, Oxford
Career: Physician, Middlesex Hospital (1769); Physician Extraordinary to the King (1777); Physician in Ordinary to the King (1792); Physician General to the Army (1794)
Obituaries: Proc Roy Soc 1830-1831 No 1 p 10
